00289       { return ( (0 <= atomId) && (atomId < cellTags_.capacity()) ); }

00302    /*
00303    * Get total number of cells in this CellList.
00304    */
00305    inline int CellList::totCells() const
00306    { return totCells_; }
00307 
00308    /*
00309    *  Return index of the cell that contains the position array pos = {x, y, z}.
00310    */
00311    inline int CellList::cellIndexFromPosition(const Vector &pos) const
00312    {
00313       int cx, cy, cz;
00314       cx = int(pos[0]/cellWidth_[0]);
00315       cy = int(pos[1]/cellWidth_[1]);
00316       cz = int(pos[2]/cellWidth_[2]);
00317 
00318       // need to handle case where wrong particle bin is assigned
00319       // to particles close to the boundary due to roundoff error
00320       if (cx == numCells_[0]) {
00321          if (pos[0] >= lengths_[0])
00322             UTIL_THROW("Particle left boundary.");
00323          cx = numCells_[0] - 1;
00324       }
00325       if (cy == numCells_[1]) {
00326          if (pos[1] >= lengths_[1])
00327             UTIL_THROW("Particle left boundary.");
00328          cy = numCells_[1] - 1;
00329       }
00330       if (cz == numCells_[2]) {
00331          if (pos[2] >= lengths_[2])
00332             UTIL_THROW("Particle left boundary.");
00333          cz = numCells_[2] - 1;
00334       }
00335       return cz + cy*numCells_[2] + cx*YZCells_;
00336    }
00337 
00338    /*
00339    * Remove an Atom object from its Cell.
00340    */
00341    inline void CellList::deleteAtom(Atom &atom)
00342    {
00343       int atomId   = atom.id();
00344       assert(isValidAtomId(atomId));
00345       CellTag& cellTag = cellTags_[atomId];
00346       cells_[cellTag.cellId].deleteAtom(cellTag);
00347    }
00348 
00349    /*
00350    * Add a Atom to the appropriate cell, based on its position.
00351    */
00352    inline void CellList::addAtom(Atom &atom)
00353    {
00354       Vector position = atom.position();
00355       int    cellId   = cellIndexFromPosition(position);
00356       int    atomId   = atom.id();
00357       assert(isValidAtomId(atomId));
00358       cells_[cellId].addAtom(cellTags_[atomId], atom, cellId);
00359    }
00360 
00361    /*
00362    * Update CellList to reflect new atom position
00363    */
00364    inline void CellList::updateAtomCell(Atom &atom, const Vector &pos)
00365    {
00366       int atomId = atom.id();
00367       assert(isValidAtomId(atomId));
00368       CellTag& cellTag = cellTags_[atomId];
00369       int      oldCell = cellTag.cellId;
00370       int      newCell = cellIndexFromPosition(pos);
00371       if (oldCell != newCell) {
00372          cells_[oldCell].deleteAtom(cellTag);
00373          cells_[newCell].addAtom(cellTag, atom, newCell);
00374       }
00375    }
00376 
00377    /*
00378    * Fill an array with Ids of atoms that are near a specified position.
00379    */
00380    inline void
00381    CellList::getNeighbors(const Vector &pos, NeighborArray &neighbors) const
00382    {
00383       int nInCell;
00384       int ic = cellIndexFromPosition(pos);
00385       getCellNeighbors(ic, neighbors, nInCell);
00386    }
00387 
00388    // Private inline methods:
00389 
00390    /*
00391    * Return value of integer cell coordinate x for axis i shifted to the range
00392    * minCells_[i] <= x <= maxCells_[i].
00393    */
00394    inline int CellList::shiftCellCoordAxis(int i, int x) const
00395    {
00396       if (x > maxCells_[i]) return x - numCells_[i];
00397       if (x < minCells_[i]) return x + numCells_[i];
00398       return x;
00399    }
00400 
00401    /*
00402    * Return integer index of a cell with integer coordinates (cx,cy,cz).
00403    */
00404    inline int CellList::cellIndexFromCoord(int cx, int cy, int cz) const
00405    {
00406       return cx*YZCells_ + cy*numCells_[2] + cz ;
00407    }
00408 
00409    /*
00410    * Return (by reference) int coordinates (cx,cy,cz) of cell with index i.
00411    */
00412    inline
00413    void CellList::cellCoordFromIndex(int i, int &cx, int &cy, int &cz) const
00414    {
00415       cx = (int)(i / YZCells_);
00416       i = i - cx*YZCells_;
00417       cy = (int)(i / numCells_[2]);
00418       cz = i - cy*numCells_[2];
00419    }
00420 
00421    inline bool CellList::isAllocated() const
00422    {  return (cells_.capacity() > 0); }
00423 
00424 }
